Text:
Excellent mini-series! Can't wait for the next one!

The dogs (and cat) were introduced in short stories in the 4 issue Dark Horse "Book of ..." series. 3 of the 4 stories can be found on the Dark Horse website (link is mentioned on inside front cover of each issue of the mini); the 4th was not made available for free. However, higher-res scans of the 4 original stories can be easily found online. Just search for the following:

Dark Horse Book of Hauntings
Dark Horse Book of Monsters
Dark Horse Book of the Dead
Dark Horse Book of Witchcraft

The Dark Horse Book of Hauntings, Monsters,  the Dead and Witchcraft can be found in 'The Dark Horse Book of...'  torrent via the link below;

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4966788/The_Dark_Horse_Book_of...
